cause.description:
Voter apathy is a serious problem in the United States, having voter turnout levels lowest of all industrialized nations. The youth of today are the foundations for tomorrow, and voting is both a civic responsibility and privillege.
1. Voter apathy is a serious problem in the United States.
2. It is important that the youth of today familiarize themselves with the political process so they can become exemplary citizens and lead this nation through the world of tomorrow.
cause.mission: promote the urgency of youth participating in the democratic process
cause.name: Voting: Civic Duty and Privillege
